Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to real property tax exemptions for disabled veterans
Summary: Increases, at local option, real property tax exemptions for combat veterans who are 100% permanently disabled.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to real property tax exemptions for certain disabled veterans
